name: Upnext: TV Series Manager
shortDescription: Upnext: TV Series Manager is an MVVM Android app that allows users to be able to view show schedules, popular, trending and most anticipated shows with favorite functionality provided by Trakt API
longDescription: Upnext: TV Series Manager is an MVVM Android app that allows users to be able to view show schedules, popular, trending and most anticipated shows with favorite functionality provided by Trakt API
